weapon.name: Sword of the Eternal Eclipse
weapon.description: A sword that exists in both light and darkness.

armor.name: Titanium Armor
armor.description: An incredibly tough armor that withstands the strongest blows.

shield.name: Bastion of the Azure Storm
shield.description: A relic once struck by a divine bolt.

artifact.name: Charm of Fading Echoes
artifact.description: Whispers from a realm beyond sight.

antidote_potion.name: Antidote of Wailing Plague
antidote_potion.description: A cooling elixir brewed from the leaves of the Frostmind plant, alleviating migraines and clearing hallucinations.

recovery_effect.name: Wailing Plague
recovery_effect.description: An infectious disease that causes the afflicted to uncontrollably wail in pain, spreading misery and despair.

healing_potion.name: Essence of Rejuvenation
healing_potion.description: This revitalizing potion restores energy and vitality to the drinker.

enhancer_potion.name: Elixir of Increase Strength
enhancer_potion.description: This robust elixir temporarily amplifies the drinker's physical power, significantly boosting muscle strength and stamina.

helmets.name: Eternal Guardian Helmet
helmets.description: A helmet blessed by the spirits.

helmets.name: Helm of the Fallen
helmets.description: In memory of the fallen warriors.

weapons.name: Undertaker's Embalming Scalpel
weapons.description: This sinister instrument is imbued with necromantic energies, allowing it to cut through flesh and spirit with precision.

weapons.name: Ironclad Maul
weapons.description: A basic iron hammer, sturdy and reliable.

weapons.name: Frostbreaker Hammer
weapons.description: An advanced hammer imbued with the power of frost.

armors.name: Tattered Cloak
armors.description: A worn, ragged jacket offering minimal protection.

armors.name: Ranger's Plate
armors.description: Armor of those who guard the wilderness.

shields.name: Dragon Shield
shields.description: A shield crafted from dragon scales.

artifacts.name: Crown of Eternal Wisdom
artifacts.description: This golden crown enhances intellect and wisdom.

boots.name: Chaoswalker Boots
boots.description: Step through the realms of chaos.

rings.name: Ring of Eternal Flame
rings.description: A ring that burns with eternal fire.

profile.name: Gossiper
profile.description: In every corner of the tavern and every market stall, the Gossiper weaves his web of words. With a sharp tongue and keen ear, he gathers and disseminates information with the skill of a master spy. His words can rally a crowd or destroy a reputation in minutes. No secret escapes his reach, and although his motives are often questionable, his knowledge is indisputable. The Gossiper is the master of rumor, a weaver of intrigues whose words have the power to change the destiny of kingdoms.

attributes.name: Intelligence
attributes.description: The intelligence controls the chance of success when using a potion

attributes.name: Dexterity
attributes.description: Manages the chance of success when using a melee weapon and the damage a missile weapon does

attributes.name: Insanity
attributes.description: Indicates the state of mental health of an adventurer. If the insanity is high, there will be more chance to make a fumble of a critical hit, and the resulting damage will be more critical. If the insanity is low, there will be less chance to make a fumble or a critical hit, and the resulting damage will be less critical

attributes.name: Charisma
attributes.description: Indicates the chance to attack first in the next round

attributes.name: Constitution
attributes.description: Indicates the number of Hit Points an adventurer starts with

attributes.name: Strength
attributes.description: Manages the chance of success when using a melee weapon, and the damage a melee weapon does

helmet.name: Sunfire Helm
helmet.description: Radiates the light of a thousand suns.

weapon.name: Sword of the Eternal Eclipse
weapon.description: A sword that exists in both light and darkness.

armor.name: Titanstone Plate
armor.description: Forged in the heart of a dying titan.

artifact.name: Amulet of Blazing Dawn
artifact.description: Shines with the light of dawn.

antidote_potion.name: Antidote of Wailing Plague
antidote_potion.description: A cooling elixir brewed from the leaves of the Frostmind plant, alleviating migraines and clearing hallucinations.

recovery_effect.name: Wailing Plague
recovery_effect.description: An infectious disease that causes the afflicted to uncontrollably wail in pain, spreading misery and despair.

healing_potion.name: Essence of Vitality
healing_potion.description: A rejuvenating potion that restores vigor and vitality to the drinker.

enhancer_potion.name: Elixir of Increase Constitution
enhancer_potion.description: This hearty elixir enhances the drinker's physical resilience and endurance.

helmets.name: Eternal Guardian Helmet
helmets.description: A helmet blessed by the spirits.

weapons.name: Stonebreaker
weapons.description: A heavy hammer used to crush rocks.

weapons.name: Whispering Blade
weapons.description: A finely crafted sword with a sleek design.

weapons.name: Frostbreaker Hammer
weapons.description: An advanced hammer imbued with the power of frost.

weapons.name: Oakfist Hammer
weapons.description: A wooden hammer reinforced with iron.

weapons.name: Darkwood Axe
weapons.description: A powerful axe forged from darkwood.

armors.name: Dreadnought Armor
armors.description: Heavy armor worn by unbreakable warriors.

armors.name: Valkyrie's Armor
armors.description: Worn by legendary warriors, this armor is said to protect those worthy.

shields.name: Shadow's Embrace Shield
shields.description: A shield that shrouds the bearer in shadows.

artifacts.name: Crown of Eternal Wisdom
artifacts.description: This golden crown enhances intellect and wisdom.

rings.name: Ring of the Thunderclap
rings.description: Unleashes the sound of thunder with each blow.

rings.name: Ring of Eternal Flame
rings.description: A ring that burns with eternal fire.

profile.name: Bumbler
profile.description: In the chaotic tapestry of life, the Bumbler stumbles through with a charm all his own. His mismatched attire and perpetually confused expression belie a heart of gold and an uncanny knack for finding himself at the center of extraordinary events. Though he trips over his own feet and often seems lost, fate has a curious way of guiding him to where he is needed most. The Bumblerâ€™s innocence and good intentions make him a magnet for both trouble and wonder. His misadventures, filled with laughter and unexpected heroism, endear him to all he meets. He is the unlikeliest of heroes, proving time and again that even the most seemingly hapless among us can make a profound difference in the world.
